Name: Drake Golem OX
Description:
Manufacturer: Drake Interplanetary
Focus: Cargo
 
With the Golem OX, Drake has transformed the dependable workhorse into the ideal cargo ship for hauling supplies and equipment. Made for pilots who prefer function over frills, the OX doubles the capacity of the original with room for 64 SCU and features a tractor beam to make cargo transfers smooth as silk.
